text: Sebastian Koto Khoarai, O.M.I. (11 September 1929 - 17 April 2021) was a prelate of the Catholic Church who was bishop of Mohale's Hoek, Lesotho from 1977 to 2014. He was made a cardinal in 2016 and was the first and so far the only cardinal from Lesotho. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church
title: Sebastian Koto Khoarai
